title: Chapter 1148 - Qing Wan’S Origins
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1148 - Qing Wan’S Origins

Boom!

Sword qi swept through the air, illuminating the skies and ruthlessly cleaving into the blood moon.

The figure within the blood moon swayed violently, and a rain of blood-colored light scattered.

The woman’s face frosted over, and her black jade staff suddenly burst with golden light, then suddenly tapped the air.

Streaks of golden lightning descended explosively upon the human realm, each like a roaring dragon.

Each streak of golden lightning seemed to possess its own spirit. They contained dense glyphs of the Laws, and when they descended, their electric power manifested illusory demonic gods.

It was as if a vast heavenly army were charging him astride the backs of electric dragons. Their power was far beyond the tribulation light the woman in blue had used earlier!

“What kind of Law is this? It doesn’t just contain the Laws of Heavenly Prayer. It seems like it contains other powers of the Grand Dao just as powerful…” 

Su Yi was deeply surprised. He’d seen the Laws of Heavenly Prayer, Cosmic Silence, and Spirit Nirvana. Each was the supreme Celestial Law of its respective star realm.

But he’d never even considered that someone’s power of the Laws could contain a supreme Celestial Law like Heavenly Prayer. 

It’s actually somewhat similar...
